title: From ASM.JS to WebAssembly
description: tl;dr I’m burying the lede with context and catch-up material first, so impatient or already-clued-in readers should skip to below the videos for today’s big news. Or just read Luke Wagner‘s blog post right now. My Fluent 2015 “ECMAScript Harmony: Rise of the Compilers” talk given on April 21st: Jeremy Ashkenas picked up this ball …

title: Parsing BibTeX in Racket and generating S-Expressions, JSON, XML and BibTeX
